details.text: With Polaroid Cloud, you can sync your photos to your favorite cloud service while still enjoying the instant printing youâ€™ve come to expect from Polaroid. Using our special instant photo paper, your image is uploaded to the web and a QR code is generated and printed with the instant photo. Perfect for sharing with your friends and family.

list.text: Connect your polaroid to a WiFi network
Point, shoot, and print your QR-tagged photo
Share your physical and digital photos with friends and family
